title: Party Pork Ribs
instructions: Brush ribs with mustard.   Season the ribs with your favorite rub.   Place ribs on the grill for 1 hour.

After an hour put the ribs into a disposable aluminum pan.   Cut butter into 1 tablespoon portions and put into pan with the ribs.  Add additional rub.  Liberally cover in BBQ sauce.   Cover in aluminum foil and place back on grill for another 90 minutes.
source: Original recipe from tiktok video.   Updated slightly by myself.
